
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```



```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.width=12, fig.height=6, fig.align='center'}
data(ToothGrowth)
tg <- ToothGrowth

g <- ggplot(tg,  aes(x = c(1:60), y = len), colour = supp)
g <- g + geom_point(aes(color = supp)) + 
g <- g + facet_grid(. ~ dose) + xlab("Observations") + ylab("Length")
g

```
